full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 55 of 261 1195
LC6VMAX2 Kate - direct
1 Oxford?
2 A. No.
3 Q. During your late teens and early twenties, what did you do for a living?
4 A. In my late teens and early twenties I -- I became a musician and a model.
5 Q. You testified earlier that Epstein initiated sexual activity with you when you were 17 years old. Approximately when did he stop initiating sexual activity with you?
6 A. Approximately in my early thirties.
7 Q. When you spent time with Epstein in that time period, about how often did he initiate sexual activity with you?
8 A. Sorry. Can you repeat that?
9 Q. When you spent time with Epstein, how often did he initiate sexual activity with you?
10 A. Every time.
11 Q. When Epstein initiated sexual activity with you, was that always in the context of massage?
12 A. No.
13 Q. When you spent time with Epstein, did you provide him with sexualized massages?
14 A. Yes.
15 Q. In what locations did these sexualized massages with Epstein take place?
16 A. In London, in Palm Beach, and on his island.
17 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00012806

16 A. In London, in Palm Beach, and on his island.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and legible format. The content discusses a witness's testimony regarding their interactions with Jeffrey Epstein. There are no visible redactions or damage to the document.
